questionTitle: Which of the following is the core module of Android for Internet computing?
questionExplanation: Android serve as consumer or client for cloud computing services.

questionOption1: Google Chrome to Phone Extension sends links and information from a Chrome browser to an Android phone
questionOption2: Voice Actions for Android is a voice command and speech recognition program
questionOption3: Google Goggles is used for local search
questionExplanation: Google Chrome to Phone Extension places a button in your Chrome browser that can push links, maps, selected text, or phone numbers out to your Android phone.

questionTitle: Which of the following Google Application can be found in Android?
questionExplanation: Google Translate is a language searching program.

questionTitle: Which of the following applications are processed locally on the phone?
questionExplanation: Smartphones are essentially miniaturized computers which run locally.

questionOption1: Voice Actions for Android allows you to use spoken commands to control your Android phone
questionOption2: The Android Market is not available on Android phones through the Market application
questionOption3: Video is accessed with the microphone button inside the Google search box on the Android home screen
questionExplanation: This includes dialing a contact, getting a map, sending text or email, playing a music file and browsing the Web.

questionTitle: Which of the following has not included support for Adobe Flash or Java on its platform?
questionExplanation: Many sites viewed within the Safari micro-browser are not completely rendered.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Apple’s cloud service for hosted email service?
questionExplanation: Apple’s Mobile Me contains a number of cloud services such as iDisk, hosted e-mail, and more.

questionTitle: Which of the following programming medium is used by MobileMe to create the appearance of a desktop application inside a browser?
questionExplanation: The central application in the suite is Apple’s hosted em-ail service.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a photo and video sharing service by MobileMe?
questionExplanation: iDisk is an online storage drive that can browsed and from which items can be shared.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Apple’s instant messaging service that interoperates with AIM?
questionExplanation: With MobileMe installed on Windows, you can synchronize data with your MobileMe account to Windows.
